publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3623 Marilyn Livingstone: 104 Pairs of Shoes Exhibition—That the Parliament congratulates the coordinated efforts of the Community Team of Adam Smith College and Fife Council’s Community Learning and Development Department in bringing the exhibition, 104 Pairs of Shoes, to Kirkcaldy on 5 and 6 March 2009; commends YMCA Scotland for its innovation in using 104 pairs of shoes donated by some of Scotland’s most famous actors, writers, politicians and entertainers and women from all walks of life to represent the fact that 104 women are killed each year in Britain due to domestic violence, and supports the tour of the exhibition around the country and the zero tolerance message it promotes.

S3M-3623 Marilyn Livingstone: 104 Pairs of Shoes Exhibition—That the Parliament congratulates the coordinated efforts of the Community Team of Adam Smith College and Fife Council’s Community Learning and Development Department in bringing the exhibition, 104 Pairs of Shoes, to Kirkcaldy on 5 and 6 March 2009; commends YMCA Scotland for its innovation in using 104 pairs of shoes donated by some of Scotland’s most famous actors, writers, politicians, entertainers and women from all walks of life to represent the fact that 104 women are killed each year in Britain due to domestic violence, and supports the tour of the exhibition around the country and the zero tolerance message it promotes.
S3M-3623 104 Pairs of Shoes Exhibition (lodged on 5 March 2009) Sandra White*, Margaret Mitchell*
S3M-3623 104 Pairs of Shoes Exhibition (lodged on 5 March 2009) Sarah Boyack*, Jamie Hepburn*, Karen Whitefield*
